content.text:
# 1988 Queensland Open – Singles

Tim Mayotte
| runner     =  Martin Davis
| score      = 6–4, 6–4
| type       = singles doubles
| draw       = 32 (3/4/1)
| seeds      = 8
}}
Kelly Evernden was the defending champion, but lost in the first round to Eric Jelen.
Tim Mayotte won the title by defeating Martin Davis 6–4, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Tim Mayotte (champion)
#  Darren Cahill (first round)
#  John Fitzgerald (second round)
#  Slobodan Živojinović (first round)
#  John Frawley (second round)
# (n/a)
#  Eric Jelen (second round)
#  Joey Rive (second round)
}}
